QRGenerator.title: Employee QR Code Generator
QRGenerator.csvFormat: CSV should have a column: name
QRGenerator.instruction1: Upload a CSV file with employee names or add employees manually
QRGenerator.instruction2: Each employee gets a unique UUID automatically generated
QRGenerator.instruction3: Download individual QR codes or all at once
QRGenerator.instruction4: Export the data for Firebase import
QRGenerator.instruction5: Print QR codes on badges or stickers for the event
